required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Comparison of Changes of QTc, Tp-e Interval, and Tp-e/QT Ratio, Tp-e/QTc Ratio on the ECG During Robotic-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy Under Sevoflurane, Desflurane and Total Intravenous Anesthesia -Randomized Controlled Trial
clinical_study.official_title: The Comparison of Changes of QTc, Tp-e Interval, and Tp-e/QT Ratio, Tp-e/QTc Ratio on the ECG During Robotic-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy Under Sevoflurane, Desflurane and Total Intravenous Anesthesia -Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the changes of QTc, Tp-e interval, and Tp-e/QT ratio, Tp-e/QTc ratio on the ECG during robotic-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy under sevoflurane, desflurane and total intravenous anesthesia

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: sevoflurane group desflurane group total intravenous anesthesia group

primary_outcome.time_frame: participants will be followed for the duration of surgery, an expected average of 4 hours.
primary_outcome.description: QTc intervals (msec) are recorded from ECG

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (T0), 10 min after induction (T1), 5, 15, 30, 45, 60 min after Trendelenburg position (T2-6), 5 min after desufflation and resuming the supine position (T7), end of surgery (T8)
Baseline (T0), 10 min after induction (T1), 5, 15, 30, 45, 60 min after Trendelenburg position (T2-6), 5 min after desufflation and resuming the supine position (T7), end of surgery (T8)
Baseline (T0), 10 min after induction (T1), 5, 15, 30, 45, 60 min after Trendelenburg position (T2-6), 5 min after desufflation and resuming the supine position (T7), end of surgery (T8)
Baseline (T0), 10 min after induction (T1), 5, 15, 30, 45, 60 min after Trendelenburg position (T2-6), 5 min after desufflation and resuming the supine position (T7), end of surgery (T8)
Baseline (T0), 10 min after induction (T1), 5, 15, 30, 45, 60 min after Trendelenburg position (T2-6), 5 min after desufflation and resuming the supine position (T7), end of surgery (T8)

clinical_study.condition: Patients Undergoing Robotic-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy

arm_group.description: general anesthesia with total intravenous anesthesia

intervention.description: anesthesia was induced with propofol (1.5 mg/kg) and target controlled infusion (TCI) of remifentanil (2-3 ng/mL of targeted effect site concentration (Ce). After intubation, inspired concentration of sevoflurane (0.8-1 MAC) and the Ce of remifentanil TCI (1.0-2.0 ng/ml) were adjusted to a BIS target level for hypnosis of 40-60 during surgery.

anesthesia was induced with propofol (1.5 mg/kg) and target controlled infusion (TCI) of remifentanil (2-3 ng/mL of targeted effect site concentration (Ce). After intubation, inspired concentration of desflurane (0.8-1 MAC) and the Ce of remifentanil TCI (1.0-2.0 ng/ml) were adjusted to a BIS target level for hypnosis of 40-60 during surgery.

anesthesia was induced with an effect-site concentration of 3-4 μg/ml propofol and 2-3 ng/ml remifentanil using target-controlled infusion (TCI). After intubation, The effect site TCI of propofol (2-3 μg/ml) and remifentanil (1.0-2.0 ng/ml) was adjusted to maintain the desired hypnosis (40-60 of the BIS value) during surgery.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. ASA class I-III
2. patients undergoing elective robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy
3. adult (≥19 years old)
Exclusion Criteria:
1. emergency surgery
2. preoperative QTc prolongation
3. Cardiac disease (unstable angina, congestive heart failure, valvular heart disease)
4. uncontrolled hypertension (DBP >110 mmHg)
5. Patients who take beta blocker
6. Ventricular conduction abnormality
7. Hepatic or renal failure
8. Drug hyperactivity
9. patients unable to understand informed consent (foreigner, illiteracy..)

eligibility.gender_description: Patients undergoing robotic-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy
